---
title: "Load / save Galton's height data"
output:
  pdf_document: default
  html_notebook: default
---

Data from:

    Galton, F. (1886). Regression Towards Mediocrity in Hereditary Stature
    Journal of the Anthropological Institute, 15, 246-263

```{r}
install.packages('HistData')
library(HistData)
data(Galton)
write.csv(Galton, 'processed/galton_heights.csv', row.names=FALSE)
write.csv(GaltonFamilies, 'processed/galton_families.csv', row.names=FALSE)
```
